Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.joint.LineJoint
    As of version 3.0.0 replaced with WheelJoint
    org.dyn4j.collision.RectangularBounds
    replaced with AxisAlignedBounds in 3.1.1
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.World.add(Body)
    replaced with World.addBody(Body) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.World.add(Joint)
    replaced with World.addJoint(Joint) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.Body.apply(double)
    replaced with Body.applyTorque(double) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.Body.apply(Force)
    replaced with Body.applyForce(Force) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.Body.apply(Torque)
    replaced with Body.applyTorque(Torque) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.Body.apply(Vector2)
    replaced with Body.applyForce(Vector2) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.Body.apply(Vector2, Vector2)
    replaced with Body.applyForce(Vector2, Vector2) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.Body.getVelocity()
    replaced by Body.getLinearVelocity() in 3.1.5
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.Body.getVelocity(Vector2)
    replaced by Body.getLinearVelocity(Vector2) in 3.1.5
    org.dyn4j.geometry.Transform.inverseTransformR(Vector2, Vector2)
    replaced with Transform.getInverseTransformedR(Vector2, Vector2) in 3.1.5
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.contact.ContactManager.isEmpty()
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.World.remove(Body)
    replaced with World.removeBody(Body) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.World.remove(Body, boolean)
    replaced with World.removeBody(Body, boolean) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.World.remove(Joint)
    replaced with World.removeJoint(Joint) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.World.removeAll()
    replaced with World.removeAllBodiesAndJoints() in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.World.removeAll(boolean)
    replaced with World.removeAllBodiesAndJoints(boolean) in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.World.removeListeners()
    replaced with World.removeAllListeners() in 3.1.1
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.Body.setVelocity(Vector2)
    replaced by Body.setLinearVelocity(Vector2) in 3.1.5
    org.dyn4j.geometry.Transform.transformR(Vector2, Vector2)
    replaced with Transform.getTransformedR(Vector2, Vector2) in 3.1.5
